participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Curious and analytical, enjoys deep conversations about life and interests.
participant_1.background: My favorite tv shows are forensic files and jeopardy. My favorite food is anything italian. My favorite book that I've read lately is Middlesex. I love most music except country and jazz. I am a gym rat that loves to play racquetball.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, enjoys quiet activities and has a passion for crafts.
participant_2.background: I have a cat. I love to sew. I wait tables at a cafe. I like to be alone.

content.text: My favorite book is Middlesex, by Jeffrey Eugenides. It's a beautiful, heartbreaking story about a family with a secret.
I haven't heard of that one before, but it sounds interesting. I'll have to check it out.
I highly recommend it. What's your favorite TV show?
I'm a big fan of Forensic Files. It's a documentary series about real-life murder cases.
I love that show! I'm always amazed by the way they can solve the crimes.
Me too! It's so interesting to see how they put the pieces together.
I love Italian food. I could eat pasta every day!
Me too! I love all the different types of pasta and sauces.
What's your favorite type of pasta?
I like spaghetti, but I also love ravioli and lasagna.
Those are all good choices! I also like fettuccine.
I've never had fettuccine before. What's it like?
It's a flat, wide noodle. It's usually served with a creamy sauce.
That sounds delicious! I'll have to try it sometime.
You should! I'm sure you'll like it.
